title: EF Education-EasyPost Continues Transfer Blitz with Seventh New Signing for 2024
content:
EF Education-EasyPost enjoys strong close to season with stage win and race lead at Tour de Langkawi with Simon Carr.

Read the full article at EF Education-EasyPost Continues Transfer Blitz with Seventh New Signing for 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
